verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> to my <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3427>"Sit<s%> at my right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> until I <S%H7896>make<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%> your footstool for your <S%H1916>feet.<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H7971>send<s%> forth the <S%H4294>rod<s%> of your <S%H5797>strength<s%> out of <S%H6726>Zion.<s%> <S%H7287>Rule<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of your <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

Your <S%H5971>people<s%> offer themselves <S%H5071>willingly<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H2428>power,<s%> in <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1926>array.<s%> Out of the <S%H7358>womb<s%> of the <S%H4891>morning,<s%> you have the <S%H2919>dew<s%> of your <S%H3208>youth.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H7650>sworn,<s%> and will not <S%H5162>change<s%> his <S%H3548>mind:<s%> "You are a priest <S%H5769>forever<s%> in the <S%H1700>order<s%> of <S%H4442>Melchizedek.<s%>"
The <S%H136>Lord<s%> is at your right <S%H3225>hand.<s%> He will <S%H4272>crush<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H639>wrath.<s%>

He will <S%H1777>judge<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations.<s%> He will <S%H4390>heap<s%> up dead <S%H1472>bodies.<s%> He will <S%H4272>crush<s%> the <S%H7218>ruler<s%> of the <S%H7227>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth.<s%>
He will <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H5158>brook<s%> in the <S%H1870>way;<s%> therefore he will lift <S%H7311>up<s%> his <S%H7218>head.<s%>
